notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: Conception and design: F.X.M., P.F.X. development of methodology: P.F.X., J.K.L. acquisition of data: Q.W.C., Y.Y.W., F.X.M., M.D.H., Z.W. analysis and interpretation of data: Q.W.C., Y.Y.W., F.X.M., M.D.H., J.K.L. writing outline of manuscript: Q.W.C., J.K.L. and reading and revision of manuscript: Q.W.C., Y.Y.W., F.X.M., M.D.H., Z.W., J.K.L., P.F.X. study supervision: J.K.L., P.F.X.
